name: uneaten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not eaten: Steve put his uneaten sandwich down on the table. Think about the amount of food left uneaten every night by every household in the country.
More examplesFewer examplesA cottage cheese salad lay uneaten on her plate.She fell asleep with the television on and a plate of uneaten food in front of her.The children's school lunches always come back with the cucumbers and tomatoes uneaten.On the side was the tray with the sandwiches uneaten but the lemonade drunk.
